snippet: President Obama, seeking to quell criticism from Republicans and pro-Israel groups, directed his party to restore language declaring Jerusalem Israel’s capital.
abstract: Pres Obama, seeking to quell a storm of criticism from Republicans and pro-Israel groups, directs the Democratic Party to amend its platform to restore language declaring Jerusalem the Israeli capital; change, approved in a voice vote at the Democratic National Convention, had to be taken three times because of a chorus of noes in the arena.
lead_paragraph: President Obama, seeking to quell criticism from Republicans and pro-Israel groups, directed his party to restore language declaring Jerusalem Israel’s capital.

headline.seo: Pushed by Obama, Democrats Alter Platform Over Jerusalem
